======  mg Devil Course =================
-----------------------------------------
First time making a map for CSS...
I have experience to make any type of color !
-----------------------------------------
It may have some pink defects on walls, if you see it, then i don't have idea how to fix that. Texture by itself cause the pink defects. 
-----------------------------------------
This has like 10 levels and when you bit it you get 700 frags & points.
I don't think there is any bugs but you can comment bellow !
-----------------------------------------
This map is type: SCARRY
-----------------------------------------
I HOPE YOU LIKE THIS MAP GUYS HAVE FUN !
-----------------------------------------
